#...b...A..........#
#.......A..........#
###BBB###.......a..#
#..................#

#..?.##A#..........#

#..................#
#A####C#.....##^^###
#......#.....A.....#
#.^^^^^#.....A..a..#
#......#.....#.....#
#.....c#############
the final character is: #
